title: Exciting updates for Garmin G3x Touch: bug fixes & reversionary mode added in Sim Update 15
description:
In this short we will look at which fixes are included in the 3rd beta build of Sim Update 15 and will be released soon. 

For a full overview of issues fixes as well as new functionality added see the full video below:
https://youtu.be/hO4XzrvOwjY
